rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with Art Deco motifs integrated into the design. The space leads to both the central courtyard and home office.
An open, airy courtyard at the center of the bungalow serving as a focal point for natural light and ventilation. Features a decorative water fountain designed in Art Deco style.
A dedicated work space with ample natural lighting from the courtyard side, soundproof walls, and built-in storage to maintain functionality and aesthetics.
A spacious living room designed in Art Deco style featuring bold geometric patterns and rich textures. It offers a comfortable seating area near the courtyard window.
An elegant dining space that opens up to the living room with integrated Art Deco detailing, perfect for hosting gatherings.
